name: cluster-queue/dummy
description: Dummy project for php-cluster-queue-core. A project to setup a server configuration for a cluster. Eg. with DRDB, heartbeat for DB/ WWW Servers; This is the dummy package to start your own using the core package in the background

post-install-cmd: if [ ! -f vendor/bin/php-cluster-queue ]; then mkdir -p vendor/bin && cd vendor/bin && ln -s ../cluster-queue/core/php-cluster-queue php-cluster-queue; fi
